column2:
'while a compute cluster can have more nodes.'
'A compute instance:'
'.'
'Has a jo queue.'
'.'
'Runs jos securely in a virtual network environment, without requiring enterprises'
'to open up SSH port. The jo executes in a containerized environment and'
'packages your model dependencies in a Docker container.'
'.'
'Can run multiple small jos in parallel (preview). One jo per core can run in'
'parallel while the rest of the jos are queued.'
'.'
'Supports single-node multi-GPU distriuted training jos'
'You can use compute instance as a local inferencing deployment target for test/deug'
'scenarios.'
'? Tip'
'The compute instance has 120GB OS disk. If you run out of disk space and get into'
'an unusale state, please clear at least 5 GB disk space on OS disk (mounted on /)'
